name: Kart In A Row
description:
You must know the four in a row game, where you have to align 4 coins in a row, column, or diagonal in a 7 x 6 grid ?

This time, you don’t have to wait your turn to play, just rush for the coin, avoid opponent collisions and bring the coin back to the center !

You will have to be very time precise since a clock is controlling the column where the coin will drop !

This is a game for two players, locally.

Music 100% created during the event. Some sound effects are not made by us.

Game developed during the Mix & Game Jam 2020
